Chicago - OpinionLab - http://www.opinionlab.com/senior-rails-engineer/

OpinionLab is seeking a Senior Rails Engineer with strong development skills to join our Chicago, IL based Product Development team.

As a member of our Product Development team, you will play a critical role in the architecture, design, development, and deployment of OpinionLab’s web-based applications and services. You will be part of a high-visibility agile development team empowered to deliver high-quality, innovative, and market leading voice-of-customer data acquisition and feedback intelligence solutions. If you thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced, get-it-done environment and want to be a part of one of Chicago’s most innovative companies, we want to speak with you!
